channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2183] Love Is Like A Water Park [Image]
item.description: Bummed out Lost is over? Your dad to the rescue on Facebook with random metaphors that will blow your mind.

item.title: [+1698] Warning: Do NOT Honk At This Dog!
[+1439] Apple on iPhone 4 reception issues: you're holding it wrong
item.description: We're thinking it too: this sounds crazy. Essentially, Apple is saying that the problem is how you hold your phone, and that the solution is to change that habit, or buy one of their cases.

item.title: [+1282] Bing AutoComplete Fails
[+1205] Obama Administration Announces a Massive Piracy Crackdown
item.description: According to the Obama administration, the RIAA, and MPAA, the world economy is pretty much doomed if we don't start prosecuting pirates at home and abroad. Without such a crackdown, businesses will go bankrupt the coalition argues. Biden states, "Piracy hurts, it hurts our economy."

item.title: [+1158] Overcompensating (COMIC)
[+1118] Leopard turns the tables on hunter (Warning: Graphic)
item.description: We now know which one is the real pussy.

item.title: [+1025] The World's Reaction to Landon Donovan's Game Winning Goal
item.description: From California to France and South Africa, here's the world's reaction to LD's game winning goal!

item.title: [+1014] Top 5 Hot Girls Playing Video Games (a little mild NSFW)
item.description: Wouldn't recommend watching these with your boss around. Or your wife, for that matter.

item.title: [+910] Hey Apple, you're holding it wrong!
item.description: So we should hold it differently eh Steve?

item.title: [+701] Exposed: Farmers Who Get Billions Yet Never Plowed a Field
item.description: Billions in tax dollars go to frauds who have never plowed a field. How did the system get so corrupt?

item.title: [+629] Some Of Us Will Always Lose (COMIC)
[+540] 6 Insane True Stories Behind The Stage Names of Celebrities
item.description: A person's Hollywood career pretty much banks on their name. Some of these stories, though, are just downright ridiculous.

item.title: [+515] Students Sue Over Removal of American Flag T-shirts
item.description: [Followup to earlier story] Is America conquered when the American flag is offensive? Students now suing after they were told to take off "inappropriate" shirts worn to school on Cinco de Mayo. By "inappropriate" of course the school meant "has the American flag on it."

item.title: [+508] Bristol Palin can't act her way out of a shoebox (video)
item.description: See Bristol Palin's acting debut on 'Secret Life'

item.title: [+503] New York Yankees. Just buying another Championship
item.description: It is simply disgraceful that one team can dwarf the entire league by that much. What kind of skill does it take to buy the best and most expensive player and plop him on your team?

item.title: [+496] Venezuela seizes oil rigs owned by U.S. company
item.description: Venezuela's government has seized control of 11 oil rigs owned by U.S. driller Helmerich & Payne, arguing that drilling had to be restarted after the company halted operations in response to delayed payments from the country's state oil company.

item.title: [+487] NYPD lets the top down...(Pic)
